alert.note: Alert for Death Valley National Park; Owens Valley; Western Mojave Desert (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 21 at 2:31AM PST until January 21 at 7:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...North winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of southern Nevada and southeast California. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 7 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Hazardous driving conditions on east-to-west roadways for high-profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Dangerous crosswinds possible along Interstate 15 between Barstow-Daggett and Las Vegas as well as Interstate 40 between Barstow-Daggett and Needles.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Death Valley National Park; Owens Valley; Western Mojave Desert
